Package org.aeonbits.owner.loaders

Interface Loader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertiesLoader, SystemLoader, XMLLoader, ZooKeeperLoader

    public interface Loader
extends Serializable
    Defines the interface of a generic Properties loader.
    Since:
    1.0.5
    Author:
    Luigi R. Viggiano

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean accept​(URI uri)
      Indicates wether this Loader does accept the URL, guessing the content type from it.
      String defaultSpecFor​(String uriPrefix)
      Returns the default URI specification for a given url resource, that can be handled by this loader.
      void load​(Properties result, URI uri)
      Loads the given uri into the given result

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        boolean accept​(URI uri)
        Indicates wether this Loader does accept the URL, guessing the content type from it.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI
        Returns:
        true, if the loader is able to handle the content of the URI.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • load

        void load​(Properties result,
          URI uri)
   throws IOException
        Loads the given uri into the given result
        Parameters:
        result - the resulting properties where to load the uri
        uri - the URI from where to load the properties.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is some I/O error during the load.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • defaultSpecFor

        String defaultSpecFor​(String uriPrefix)
        Returns the default URI specification for a given url resource, that can be handled by this loader.
        Parameters:
        uriPrefix - the prefix identifying the url resource.
        Returns:
        the default URI specification for a given uri resource, that can be handled by this loader.
